title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 347.6 - Conduct of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 347.6 - Conduct of hearing

State Regulations

The Chiropractic Practice Committee shall not be bound by
common law or statutory rules of evidence or by technical or formal rules of
procedure, but may make such investigation or inquiry and conduct its hearing
in such a manner as it deems proper and necessary in the premises. The

Chiropractic Practice Committee may, in the event of nonappearance, decide the
value of the disputed bill on the basis of the evidence before it. Said hearing
may be held by one or more of the members of the Chiropractic Practice

Committee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
347.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
